com.ibm.avatar.algebra.datamodel

Class TupleSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.avatar.algebra.datamodel.AbstractTupleSchema
      • com.ibm.avatar.algebra.datamodel.TupleSchema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<AbstractTupleSchema>

    public class TupleSchema
extends AbstractTupleSchema
    This class encapsulates the "real" schema of an operator. That is, the schema that exactly describes the names and types of every field of the tuple, in the order that they actually appear in the tuple.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String[] colnames
      Names of the fields in the schema, in the order that they appear in tuples.
      protected FieldType[] coltypes

      static AbstractTupleSchema EMPTY_SCHEMA
      Pre-initialized schema with zero columns.

        public TupleSchema(AbstractTupleSchema baseSchema,
                   String[] names,
                   FieldType[] types)
        Create an anonymous schema by adding additional fields to an existing schema.
        Parameters:
        baseSchema - the schema this new schema will be based on
        names - name of additional fields to add (must not be present in baseSchema)
        types - data type of additional fields to add

      • TupleSchema

        public TupleSchema(AbstractTupleSchema baseSchema,
                   String name,
                   FieldType type)
        Create an anonymous schema by adding a single field to an existing schema.
        Parameters:
        baseSchema - the schema this new schema will be based on
        name - name of the additional field to add (must not be present in baseSchema)
        type - data type of the additional field to add (must not be Text)

      • TupleSchema

        Parameters:
        baseSchema - the schema this new schema will be based on
        colName - name of additional Text field to add (must not be present in baseSchema)

                   boolean anon)
        Constructor that creates a duplicate of a schema.
        Parameters:
        schema - schema to copy
        anon - true to create an anonymous schema; false to create an exact copy of the input (with the same name)

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(AbstractTupleSchema o)
        Comparison function for tuple schemas. Must sort base schemas lower than derived ones. Comparison function for tuple schemas. Must sort base schemas lower than derived ones.

      • compareWithoutRecursion

        @Deprecated
public int compareWithoutRecursion(AbstractTupleSchema o)
        Deprecated. Text type is no longer parameterized
        A version of AbstractTupleSchema.compareTo(AbstractTupleSchema) that will not recurse on a particular type; used to avoid infinite recursion when comparing schemas that involve Text types. A version of compareTo(AbstractTupleSchema) that will not recurse on a particular type; used to avoid infinite recursion when comparing schemas that involve Text types.
        Specified by:
        compareWithoutRecursion in class AbstractTupleSchema
        Parameters:
        o - schema to compare against

      • getFieldByName

        protected Object getFieldByName(Tuple tup,
                                String fieldName)
        Internal method to allow classes in the Datamodel package to get at fields directly by name. Classes outside this package should use accessors.

      • getFieldTypeByName

        public FieldType getFieldTypeByName(String fieldName)
        Get the data type of a field, by field name. Method to get field data type in schema by given field name.
        Overrides:
        getFieldTypeByName in class AbstractTupleSchema
        Parameters:
        fieldName - name of a field in this schema
        Returns:
        the type of the indicated field; will throw a RuntimeException if the field does not exist

      • objsToTups

        public TupleList objsToTups(String[][] strs,
                            TupleSchema externalSchema)
        Convert the string representation of a collection of tuples to tuple values.
        Parameters:
        strs - the string representation of a set of tuples, in COLUMN-MAJOR order (the first index is the column and the second is the row)
        externalSchema - "external" schema of the table, with columns in the same order as the elements of the strings list
        Returns:
        the tuples, converted to this schema

      • objsToTups

        public TupleList objsToTups(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> strs,
                            ArrayList<String> colNames)
        Convert the string representation of a collection of tuples to tuple values.
        Parameters:
        strs - the string representation of a set of tuples
        colNames - names of columns in the tuple schema, in the same order as the elements of the strings list
        Returns:
        the tuples, converted to this schema

      • getSpanGetters

        public ArrayList<FieldGetter<Span>> getSpanGetters()
        Return field accessors for all span fields, in reverse order. This is to be used by the ToHTML and other visualizer which want to find span fields to display but are not told which fields are spans.
        Returns:
        list of field accessors for all span fields (in reverse order)
